newOfferTarget.title: FREE <sup>$</sup>
newOfferTarget.offerCriteria: Offer valid ONE-TIME ONLY in store OR online at Target.com
newOfferTarget.offerCriteriaOnline: Offer valid ONE-TIME ONLY in online
newOfferTarget.offerCriteriaStore: Offer valid ONE-TIME ONLY in store
newOfferTarget.offerDescription1: Item Coupon. Valid in store only. Limit one manufacturer and one Target coupon per item. Limit of 4 identical coupons per household, per day. Void if copied, scanned, altered, transferred, purchased, sold or prohibited by law. Item(s) may not be available at all stores. Free Target GiftCard not valid as payment on this purchase; terms and conditions apply. Quantities limited; no rain checks. Maximum retail value
newOfferTarget.offerDescription2: for free Target GiftCard. No cash value.
